mapper.sql: id, account_num, password, phone, enroll_date, last_login_date
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user
id,
account_num,
password,
phone,
enroll_date,
last_login_date,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accountNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_user
account_num = #{accountNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enroll_date = #{enrollDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_user set account_num = #{accountNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enroll_date = #{enrollDate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_login_date = #{lastLoginDate,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT id, account_num, password, phone, enroll_date, last_login_date FROM sys_user WHERE phone = #{phone}
SELECT id, account_num, password, phone, enroll_date, last_login_date FROM sys_user WHERE account_num = #{accountNum}
